commentList.translatedContent:
It's very good. The girl at the front desk provides excellent service. The breakfast is very rich. There are plenty of fruits and vegetables.
Environment: The environment is very good
Hygiene: The sanitation is also very clean
Service: The service is great
Facilities: The facilities and equipment are very complete and very good. The whole family comes to stay. The front desk service is very enthusiastic.
commentList.content:
非常好 前台小姑娘服務特別到位 還有早餐很豐盛 水果蔬菜炒菜都很豐富，
環境：環境非常不錯 
衞生：衞生打掃的也非常乾淨 
服務：服務非常棒
設施：設施設備都很齊全 都很good 一家子人來住 前台服務特別熱情

feedbackList.content: 尊敬的賓客，您好，感謝您的入住與點評，我們將再接再厲，竭誠為您提供優質服務，我們小院能停車，周邊交通便利，距離北京朝陽高鐵站不足兩公里，步行時間大約20分鐘，酒店設定了免費洗衣房，送餐機器人，免費閲讀區和茶水區，為您的出行提供物超所值的服務。
feedbackList.translateContent: Dear guest, thank you for your stay and review. We will continue our efforts and wholeheartedly provide you with high-quality services. We have parking in our courtyard and convenient transportation. It is less than two kilometers away from Beijing Chaoyang High-speed Railway Station and takes about 20 minutes to walk. The hotel has set up a free laundry room, food delivery robot, free reading area and tea area to provide value-for-money services for your travel.

commentList.translatedContent: After staying for three days, I booked one day at a time. I wanted to try it out for one day and then continue to stay. After one day, I was informed that I would continue to stay two days later. The room was very clean and the neighborhood was very quiet. The breakfast was also expensive and the buffet was delicious and the service was great. It’s also very welcoming and the bottled water is free. I’m very satisfied.
commentList.content: 住了三天 都是一天一天訂的 心想住一天試試好再繼續住 住了一天就告訴後兩天還是續住原來房間  房間很乾凈 附近也很安靜 早餐另外花錢吃自助 很好吃 服務也特別好 熱情 瓶裝水還免費的 特別滿意奧

commentList.translatedContent: The service attitude is very good and the rooms are clean. It is fully equipped, such as brand new air conditioning facilities and excellent shower facilities. Clean and hygienic, with dedicated cleaning staff.
commentList.content: 服務態度很好，客房很乾凈。設備齊全，比如空調設施嶄新，淋浴設備優良。乾淨衞生，有專人打掃。

feedbackList.content: 尊敬的賓客，您好，感謝您的入住與點評，我們將再接再厲，竭誠為您提供優質服務，我們小院能停車，周邊交通便利，距離北京朝陽高鐵站不足兩公里，步行時間大約20分鐘，酒店設定了免費洗衣房，送餐機器人，免費閲讀區和茶水區，為您的出行提供物超所值的服務。

commentList.translatedContent: After spending 520 on Ctrip to book a family room, I went to the front desk to check in (gold members include a breakfast). I asked for a breakfast ticket. I was told that only when I book a hotel in Huazhu Club can I get a free breakfast. I wondered what logic this is against Ctrip. I checked in at the hotel you booked. Should I focus on the stay? I don’t care about the breakfast. I don’t have the habit of eating most of the meals. If you don’t, don’t advertise on Ctrip.
commentList.content: 在攜程花了520 定的家庭房 到前台辦完入住 （金會員含一份早餐）要早餐票 被告知 衹有在華住會訂酒店才能贈早餐 就納悶了什麼邏輯 這不是跟攜程搞對立麼 我在你家訂的酒店入住了 是不是應該以入住為主 不是在乎這頓飯 早餐多數沒有吃的習慣 以事論事 要不你就別再攜程打廣告

feedbackList.content: 尊敬的貴賓，您好很抱歉給您這次入住帶來不好的體驗，在此由衷的對您説聲抱歉 您的意見對我們很重要，我們會重點檢查房間床護墊，比較潮的被子會烘乾。期待您下次入住能看到我們的改變，期待您的下次光臨
feedbackList.translateContent: Dear guest, I am very sorry to bring you a bad experience during your stay. I would like to sincerely apologize to you. Your opinion is very important to us. We will focus on checking the bed pads and damp quilts in the room. will dry. Looking forward to your next stay to see our changes, looking forward to your next visit

commentList.translatedContent: The room is very clean, the sound insulation effect is also good, it is very comfortable to live in, the attitude of the staff is also very good, the feeling of staying is very good, and I will come here again next time I need it
commentList.content: 房間很乾凈，隔音效果也不錯，住着很舒服，工作人員的態度也很好，住宿的感覺是很好的，下次有需要還會來這裏

feedbackList.content: 尊敬的賓客，您好，感謝您的入住與點評，我們將再接再厲，竭誠為您提供優質服務，我們小院能停車，周邊交通便利，距離北京朝陽高鐵站不足兩公里，步行時間大約20分鐘，酒店設定了免費洗衣房，送餐機器人，免費閲讀區和茶水區，為您的出行提供物超所值的服務。
feedbackList.translateContent: Dear guest, hello, thank you for your stay and comments, we will make persistent efforts to provide you with high-quality services wholeheartedly, our small courtyard can park, and the surrounding transportation is convenient. It is less than two kilometers away from Beijing Chaoyang High-speed Railway Station, and the walking time is about 20 minutes. The hotel has set up a free laundry room, a food delivery robot, a free reading area and a tea area to provide value-for-money services for your travel.

commentList.translatedContent: The location of the hotel is very close to the high-speed rail station. It is very convenient for a family of two or two to live. The service at the front desk is very good. They can help you print. There is a big Yali Roast Duck at the door, not to be missed
commentList.content: 酒店位置離高鐵站很近，一家兩大兩小住着很方便，前台服務很好啊，幫忙打印，門口就是大鴨梨烤鴨，不容錯過

feedbackList.content: 尊敬的賓客，您好，感謝您的入住與點評，我們將再接再厲，竭誠為您提供優質服務，我們小院能停車，周邊交通便利，距離北京朝陽高鐵站不足兩公里，步行時間大約20分鐘，酒店設定了免費洗衣房，送餐機器人，免費閲讀區和茶水區，為您的出行提供物超所值的服務。

commentList.translatedContent: The room is very clean, but the room is very small. The deluxe double room is a bit too small. There is no place to put the suitcase. The service in the restaurant is very good and friendly. The front desk in the morning is also very good. I booked a taxi for me at noon.
commentList.content: 房間很乾凈就是房間很小豪華大床房有點太小了沒有放行李箱的地方，餐廳服務挺好很熱情，早上前台也挺好中午￼幫我預訂的出租車

feedbackList.content: 尊敬的賓客您好感謝您對我們的支持與信任，酒店距離朝陽高鐵站非常近，無需乘車即可到達，周邊距離大悦城很近，購物美食都很方便，我們的早餐是中西自助餐，品種很多，有北京的特色小吃，期待您常來入住哦

commentList.translatedContent: I booked this hotel because I had to take the high-speed train from Chaoyang Railway Station in Beijing. After getting off the subway, I needed to walk nearly 2 kilometers. From the hotel to Chaoyang Railway Station, I needed to walk for about 30 minutes. The hotel facilities are good, and overall it’s okay
commentList.content: 因為要從北京朝陽火車站乘坐高鐵，所以定了這個酒店，下了地鐵需要行走將近2公里，從酒店去朝陽火車站需要行走30分鐘左右，酒店設施不錯，整體還算可以

commentList.translatedContent: The hygienic conditions are good, the location is easy to find, the downstairs is the Dayali Roast Duck Restaurant, it is very convenient to eat, recommended
commentList.content: 衞生條件不錯，位置好找，樓下就是大鴨梨烤鴨店吃飯很方便，推薦

commentList.translatedContent: In order to get on the train at Chaoyang Railway Station, there is no subway there, so it is more convenient to live near the railway station. This store is not easy to find, behind a restaurant. The decoration style of Hanting is now uniform, relatively new and very clean. It takes about 30 minutes to walk to the train station, and you need to walk a section of elevated road. This Hanting is the only shop that provides rose, lemon, and wolfberry tea. I like it.
commentList.content: 為了在朝陽火車站上火車，那邊不通地鐵，住火車站附近比較方便。這個店不太好找，在一個飯店後面。漢庭的裝修風格現在都是統一的，比較新，很乾凈。去火車站，步行大概30分鐘，需要走一段高架。這家漢庭是唯一一個提供玫瑰花，檸檬，枸杞茶的店，贊一個。
